about_the_game:
Survive in style with this set of casual costumes for Leon and Ashley.
Your enemies will be too distracted by your expression of individuality to know what hit 'em!

Notes:
- Costumes can be changed by selecting EXTRAS in the pause menu.
- This content is also included as part of the Extra DLC Pack.
- This content can be used in both the main story of Resident Evil 4 and the paid extra game, Separate Ways.

  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM
